ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped in a palace of the dead! The immortal and malignant Prince Sawar thinks he'll hold Liesel captive for the rest of her life. But nobody puts the legendary vampire killer in the corner! With the help of an unlikely alley, Liesel Van Helsing must escape this madhouse of horror before she loses her life or her mind!
